title: Laurent Lucchese
text: Laurent Lucchese (born 4 April 1973) is a French former professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played as a <a href="Rugby%20league%20positions%23fullback">fullback</a> for <a href="Huddersfield%20Giants">Huddersfield</a>, <a href="Sheffield%20Eagles%20%281984%29">Sheffield Eagles</a> and <a href="Paris%20Saint-Germain%20Rugby%20League">Paris Saint-Germain</a>. He also represented <a href="France%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">France</a> at international level.
